sentences.en: a mixed grill of bacon, sausages, tomatoes and mushrooms
sentences.cn: 由咸熏肉、香肠、番茄和蘑菇做成的烤杂排

sentences.en: Come about 4 o'clock. We'll have cocktails and grill steaks.
sentences.cn: 请四点钟左右来, 我们喝鸡尾酒,吃烤牛排.
在热度适中的烤架下烹制。

sentences.en: Grill the meat for 20 minutes each side.
sentences.cn: 将肉的每一面各烤20分钟。

sentences.en: Halve the peppers and char the skins under a hot grill.
sentences.cn: 将甜椒剖成两半，在滚热的烤架上烤至外壳微焦。
我来给你烤一些羊肉吃.

sentences.en: Place the omelette under a gentle grill until the top is set.
sentences.cn: 将煎蛋饼放在烤架下用文火烘烤，直到表面凝固。

sentences.en: Pop it under the grill for five minutes.
sentences.cn: 把它放在烤架下烤五分钟。

sentences.en: Put it under the grill for a minute to brown the top.
sentences.cn: 放在烤架下烤一分钟把上面烤成金黄色.

sentences.en: Put the bread under the grill to make the toast for breakfast.
sentences.cn: 把面包放在拷架下准备做早饭吃的吐司.

sentences.en: Put the hamburgers on the grill.
sentences.cn: 把汉堡牛排放到烤架上.

sentences.en: She carried a piping hot grill of oysters and bacon.
sentences.cn: 她端出一盘滚烫的烤牡蛎和咸肉.

sentences.en: She hurried away to pour more coffee and tend to the grill.
sentences.cn: 她匆忙走开，去添加咖啡和照看烤架。

sentences.en: The mixed grill has been taken off ( the menu ).
sentences.cn: 烤杂拌这道菜已 ( 从菜单上 ) 取消了.

sentences.en: You need to grill the tomatoes until the skins blacken.
sentences.cn: 你得把番茄烤到皮变黑为止。

words.tran_cn: 炙烤（grill的过去式和过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 烤架，烧烤食物，烤肉店，门窗格栅
trans.tran_en: a part of a  cooker  in which strong heat from above cooks food on a metal shelf below
if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
if you grill something, or if it grills, you cook it by putting it on a flat metal frame with bars across it, above or below strong direct heat
